system.basicAction: You are so rugged you can shake off damage from Shakes and Hurts. Each time you suffer damage, roll a number of dice equal to your Grit divided by 2 (round up)â€”the damage is reduced by 1 per success.
system.advAction: Once per session, when you are Broken by any kind of damage, you can immediately get back up, with all attributes restored by 1 point.
